summary: This is a Bank of America personal signature card and substitute Form W-9 for a joint account setup. It documents the account opening details, ownership type selection (with or without survivorship), and tax identification certification. The document is a standard banking form used to establish account ownership and tax reporting status.

persons.name: Ali-Sherif Robinson
persons.context: Appears as the bank associate who processed or reviewed the account opening at the banking center located on Allerton Avenue.

events.title: Bank Account Opening
events.description: A joint bank account is opened at Bank of America, with the account type and survivorship options selected via a signature card and Form W-9.

locations: 111/1420[2 ALLPTON AVENUE' (likely a typo for 'Allerton Avenue', a banking center location)
keyFacts: The document is a Bank of America personal signature card and substitute Form W-9 dated November 15, 2012.
It establishes a joint account with options for survivorship (Tenants by Entireties for spouses or Joint with Right of Survivorship) or without survivorship.
The form includes certification of Taxpayer Identification Number (TIN) to avoid backup withholding for tax purposes.
A bank associate named Ali-Sherif Robinson is listed as the reviewing associate at the banking center.
The account number and bank routing number are partially visible but redacted in the provided text.
